application - package application
This package is the application package, which contains everything related to the project.
application.classes - package application.classes
Show classes that will contain static methods for handling certain events.
application.controllers - package application.controllers
The classes within this package deal with the management of graphical interfaces (fxml).
application.managers - package application.managers
It shows the classes that will take care of storing data and managing the interactions between them.
application.models - package application.models
It shows all the classes that will take care of representing the data.
application.views - package application.views
This package includes all the screens that can be viewed in fxml files.
askUserOperation() - Static method in class application.classes.Operations
This method asks the user what kind of operation he wants to perform.
